description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play in 3D! Travel through distinct environments fighting intense bosses and mobs.  Learn unique and creative skills to help you in your quest to save an endangered village. You can go in alone or team up with friends in up to 4 player cooperative play!
